ygData.subject: Re: Quick question re: choices of primary & secondary w eapons
ygData.msgSnippet: anthem and celerity would be awesome.  actually i guess i would have to test the difference between chant/celerity and anthem.  this may be a moot point, i
ygData.messageBody:
anthem and celerity would be awesome. actually i guess i would have to test
the difference between chant/celerity and anthem. this may be a moot point,
i just had to max my brass to start playing around with beserker crescendo.
i will start playing with that tonight or tomorrow and see how it goes.
downside is it does not stack with any other battle song, and without brass
it only adds small AC and 15 STR (brass doubles effect). the other effects
are what needs testing (attack speed, etc.).

Shada Silverleaf, Level 44 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
> Sent: Sunday, June 13, 1999 12:45 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Quick question re: choices of primary
> & secondary
> w eapons
>
>
> From: jhenders@...
>
> On Sun, Jun 13/99, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...> wrote:
>
> > .... At
> > level 36 you can stack chant of battle and celerity to give
> the whole party
> > a STR, DEX, AC, and AGI boost.
>
> Do you find this does a good job compared to Anthem? I tried it for a
> while with my regular group and the tanks didnt seem to think
> it was as
> effective as just Anthem. Wish Anthem and Celerity stacked,
> would make a
> real nice combo.
>
>
